products.name: Bag Type Shopper, , - Black
products.brandedName: Kurt Geiger Bag Type Shopper, , - Black
products.description: Discover the unique SHOPPER bag from the renowned British brand KURT GEIGER, combining elegance with vibrant, colorful details. This rectangular bag with a geometric pattern of repeating semi-circles in various colors impresses with its originality and functionality. Made from high-quality fabric with a smooth texture, the bag catches the eye with its dominant black color featuring gradient transitions in shades of blue, purple, green, and yellow. The front side boasts a yellow plaque engraved with the designer's logo, adding an elegant touch. The bag features a turquoise handle and a purple keychain with a metal element, making it even more unique. Its interior, maintained in black, is equipped with zippered compartments and a slip pocket, providing convenient storage. The black shoulder strap with a purple leather detail and a metal carabiner allows for various carrying options, highlighting its versatility. The bottom of the bag features the word "KURT" made from colorful letters, which is a subtle yet striking addition. WHY SHOULD YOU BUY THIS PRODUCT? * Unique design combining elegance with colorful details * High-quality materials and precise craftsmanship * Versatility - can be carried by hand or over the shoulder * Functional interior with a zipper and pocket * Renowned Kurt Geiger brand guaranteeing the highest quality

About the designer: After graduating from Fashion Design at the Art Institute of Fort Lauderdale, Johanna Ortiz moved back to her native Colombia to start her own couture label. With an innate love for her country, she strongly prioritizes collaborating with indigenous communities, women with culturally-born talents and the finest craftsman in Colombia to ensure each garment is constructed using exclusive materials and innovative techniques. Elegant and feminine, Johanna Ortiz celebrates women and encourages them to have fun with ready-to-wear while exploring their own style.

Here, we use a high-shine satin woven from silky LENZING™ ECOVERO™—the better to emphasize its flowing cape-like construction. Trapeze Fit: Cut for a flowing, A-line fit. No waist definition. Sustainability: Made with LENZING™ ECOVERO™, a breathable fiber derived from certified renewable wood sources, produced using methods that reduce water impact and emissions by up to 50% compared to traditional viscose. Crew neck with zip and hook-and-eye closure at back. Side pockets. Unlined. Trapeze fit. Short sleeves. Mini length. Model: Size S, 5'10" (178cm).

products.name: Le Pliage Medium Canvas Tote
products.brandedName: Longchamp Le Pliage Medium Canvas Tote
products.description: Elevate your everyday style with the Longchamp Le Pliage Medium Canvas Tote. This iconic tote, made in France, features the brand's signature understated luxury with a French elegance. Crafted in blue canvas with gold-tone hardware and an embossed logo to the front, this tote is the perfect combination of style and functionality. The interior is designed with two flat pockets, allowing for easy organization of your essentials. Measuring 11 inches wide by 15.4 inches high and 4.3 inches deep, with a top handle drop of 3.9 inches, this tote is spacious enough for all your daily needs. The snap closure ensures that your belongings are secure while on the go. Please note that all measurements are approximate and slight variations may occur. Rest assured that all our products are 100% genuine, sourced from trusted independent suppliers or directly from the brand owner. Add this timeless piece to your collection and enjoy the luxury of Longchamp.
